page.description: Defines how to display the embedded object when placed inside a Panel.

discussion.p: The *[ui:In Panel Card Properties]* define how to display the embedded component/page when placed in a Panel card.
These properties are only exposed if the embedded object is inside a [Panel card].

section.title: Fill Panel Card Container
section.description: Should the embedded component completely fill the Panel Card in which it is displayed?

section.title: Delay render till visible
section.description: Should this embedded component be rendered when the host page loads, or only when the Panel Card gets focus (assuming that the Panel Card is hosted in a Panel Navigator).

section.title: Refresh when Panel Card gets focus
section.description: Should the embedded component be refreshed every time the Panel Card gets focus (assuming the Panel Card is hosted in a Panel Navigator).

section.title: Synchronize when Panel Card gets focus
section.description: (Applies only if embedded component is a UX component) Should the embedded UX be synchronized when the Panel Card gets focus (assuming the Panel Card is hosted in a Panel Navigator).

important.p: If you check this option, you must give the embedded component a specific alias. You must not use the default <DefaultAlias> setting.
